what: xQTLbiolinks: a R package aims to query, download, visualize and perform colocalization analyses between xQTL data and GWAS signals
title: xQTLbiolinks: a R package aims to query, download, visual and integrate integrative analysis of GTEx data
text: xQTLbiolinks well-developed R package enables users-customized query, extraction, visualization molecular QTLs (eQTLs sQTLs) gene expression data public resources (e.g., GTEx) application programming interface (API) GTEx eQTL Catalogue. xQTLbiolinks consists tailored functions can grouped four modules: Query, Download, Analyze Visualization.

text: Package SummarizedExperiment required reposited Biocouductor, instead CRAN. first install SummarizedExperiment Biocouductor, install xQTLbiolinks Github.
code: # install required bioconductor package SummarizedExperiment: if (!require("BiocManager")){install.packages("BiocManager")} BiocManager::install("SummarizedExperiment")  # This command should automatically install any missing dependencies that are available from CRAN and GitHub. if(!require("remotes")){install.packages("remotes")} remotes::install_github("dingruofan/xQTLbiolinks")

title: Query gene information through all genes' information — apiRef_genes
text: genes Following gene types supported: Gene symbol. character string character vector (case ignored). like: "tp53","naDK","SDF4". Gencode/ensemble id (versioned unversioned). character string character vector (case ignored). like: "ENSG00000210195.2","ENSG00000078808". Entrez gene ID. integer string integer vectors. like: 51150,5590,4509. geneCategory. choose "geneCategory", "genes" must chosen following gene category: protein coding antisense lincRNA unprocessed pseudogene miRNA transcribed unprocessed pseudogene snRNA processed pseudogene processed transcript TEC transcribed unitary pseudogene transcribed processed pseudogene sense intronic misc RNA snoRNA scaRNA rRNA unitary pseudogene 3prime overlapping ncRNA polymorphic pseudogene bidirectional promoter lncRNA sense overlapping pseudogene IG V pseudogene scRNA IG C gene IG J gene IG V gene sRNA ribozyme vaultRNA non coding TR J gene TR C gene TR V gene TR V pseudogene TR D gene IG C pseudogene macro lncRNA TR J pseudogene IG D gene IG J pseudogene IG pseudogene Mt tRNA Mt rRNA geneType character string. Types queried genes. Options: "geneSymbol" (default), "gencodeId", "entrezId"; gencodeVersion character string. Two version supported: "v26" (default) "v19" genomeBuild character string. "GRCh38/hg38"(default) gencodeVersion "v26", "GRCh37/hg19" gencodeVersion "v19"

title: Query gene information through all genes' information — apiRef_genes
text: data.table queried gene information. including following columns: genes. Input genes geneSymbol. Gene symbol. gencodeId. Gencode/ensemble id (versioned). entrezGeneId. Entrez gene ID. geneType. Gene type. chromosome. Note: "chr" added gencode v26, start. end. strand. tss. Transcriptional start site. gencodeVersion. Gencode Version. genomeBuild. Genome version. description.

title: xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp — xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp
text: detect sentinel SNPs given GWAS dataset. Return sentinel snps whose pValue < 5e-8(default) SNP--SNP distance > 1e6 bp.

title: xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp — xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp
code: xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp(   gwasDF,   pValueThreshold = 5e-08,   centerRange = 1e+06,   mafThreshold = 0.01,   genomeVersion = "grch38",   grch37To38 = FALSE )

title: xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp — xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp
text: gwasDF data.frame data.table object. Five columns required (arbitrary column names supported): Col 1. "snps" (character), , using rsID (e.g. "rs11966562"). Col 2. "chromosome" (character), one chromosome chr1-chr22. Col 3. "postion" (integer), genome position snp. Col 4. "P-value" (numeric). Col 5. "MAF" (numeric). Allel frequency. pValueThreshold Cutoff gwas p-value. Default: 5e-8 centerRange SNP--SNP distance. Default:1e6 mafThreshold Cutoff maf remove rare variants. genomeVersion Genome version input file. "grch37" "grch38" (default). grch37To38 TRUE FALSE, recommend converting grch37 grch38, using input file grch38 directly. Package rtracklayer required.

title: xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp — xQTLanalyze_getSentinelSnp
text: data.table object.

title: xQTLvisual_locusCombine — xQTLvisual_locusCombine

title: xQTLvisual_locusCombine — xQTLvisual_locusCombine
text: gwasEqtldata data.frame data.table including signals GWAS eQTL. Five columns required (arbitrary column names supported): Col 1. "snps" (character), , using rsID (e.g. "rs11966562"). Col 2. "chromosome" (character), one chromosome chr1-chr22. Col 3. "postion" (integer), genome position snp. Col 4. "P-value" (numeric) GWAS signals. Col 5. "P-value" (numeric) eQTL signals. posRange Genome range want visualize (e.g. "chr6:3e7-7e7"). Default region covers snps. population One 5 popuations 1000 Genomes: 'AFR', 'AMR', 'EAS', 'EUR', 'SAS'. highlightSnp Default snp lowest p-value. legend_position (string, optional) Either 'bottomright','topright', 'topleft'. Default: 'bottomright'.
